meanings.definition: The state of having an itch.
meanings.sent1: The itchiness on my arm was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't sleep because of the itchiness on my back.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics caused an unexpected bout of itchiness.
meanings.sent4: The itchiness of curiosity consumed her mind.
meanings.sent5: The relentless itchiness seemed to have a life of its own.

meanings.definition: The sensation of needing to scratch.
meanings.sent1: She tried to ignore the persistent itchiness on her leg.
meanings.sent2: The sudden itchiness on his scalp made him reach for a comb.
meanings.sent3: The itchiness of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The itchiness of anticipation filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The intense itchiness demanded immediate attention.
